name: Warwick-PCAV
body: # Warwick Performance Computing and Visualisation (PCAV) GitHub Page This is the GitHub page of the [PCAV Group](http://www2.warwick.ac.uk/fac/sci/dcs/research/pcav/) in the Department of Computer Science, at the University of Warwick. # Codes ## [CloverLeaf ](http://warwick-pcav.github.com/CloverLeaf/) A hydrodynamics mini-app to solve the compressible Euler equations in 2D, using an explicit, second-order method. # Tools ## [WMTools](http://warwick-pcav.github.com/WMTools/) Warwick Memory Tools - Suite of tools for parallel application memory consumption analysis.
tagline: Performance Computing and Visualisation Group at the University of Warwick
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
